item.title: [HELP] Questions [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

I’m using Delta.

  1. How can I change the max cash quantity ? It’s set to 2147M and I want higher than that.

  2. My players can get out of Jail when they are jailed by typing a command to teleport away. How can I fix that ? I tried things but I get 100 errors. Here’s my ::crabs code to teleport:

if (command.startsWith("crabs") && playerRights >= 0) {
if(wildyLevel > 20 && isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1)){
sM("You cannot teleport above level 20 wilderness!");
} else {
toX = 2667;
toY = 3710;
sM("Welcome to the Rock Crabs !");
}
}
  1. More to come.

Thank you.

Read full topic
